use.flag: Enable colors fading when off focus
Enable support for bold and italic fonts
Enable scrolling via mouse wheel or buttons 4 and 5
Enable perl script support. You can still disable this at runtime with -pe ""

Enable unofficial support for the xterm SGR 1006 mouse-tracking extension. Needed to properly support mouse events for terminals with more than 223 rows or columns, in applications not supporting the urxvt 1015 extension.
Use 21 instead of 16 bits to represent unicode characters
Enable wide glyphs and true color emoji support
